name: Wrath of Zeus
description:
One kid, nine classmates dressed up in Greek costumes and one nerdy Classics teacher who created a card game just to teach his students about the Greek Gods. 

Fight your way to the top of the leader board to face the Wrath of Zeus and earn the right to call yourself the new Ruler of Olympus!



PC:

-Arrow Keys

-Mouse

-Space and Escape


Music - Epidemic Sound Royalty Free Music 
Fonts - Open Window Fonts, Caesar Dressing

Card Design & Game Designer - Sam Wilson
https://sampai-gamedev.tumblr.com/

Lead Engineer & Game Designer - Hamish Paget
@ItsOiral

Lead Concept Artist, Character Designer & Social Media Visual Artist - Siriah Steele
@SiriahRiah

Lead Modeller & VFX Designer - Rick Backhouse
https://www.instagram.com/dreamwalker002/

Producer, Tech Art & Sound Design - Brad Cox
@xocdarb

Producer, Design & Programmer - Sean Michael
@fly_SeanM
